author: catbay
created_time: March 30, 2023, 02:02:20 PMLast edit: March 30, 2023, 05:21:40 PM by catbay
content: Nexa is a next era content platform designed to reward creators and readers for high-quality content and positive behavior. Unlike traditional social media platforms, Nexa focuses on content quality rather than popularity, offering a fairer and more inclusive environment for creators and readers alike.Nexa: Next Era Content Platform with Rewards for Positive BehaviorNexa is not a social media platform, but a next era content platform that rewards positive behavior among its users. The platform allows creators to publish their work, and readers to engage with them through commenting, sharing, and liking. The initial version of Nexa will aggregate content from various platforms such as Twitter and TikTok, and reward users for reading, promoting, and commenting on high-quality content.One of the main differences between the initial version of Nexa and other platforms is the focus on positive behavior. Nexa encourages users to engage with each other in a respectful and supportive manner. Users who post high-quality content, leave insightful comments, or promote positive messages will be rewarded with cryptocurrency. The more weight a user's contribution has, the more reward they will receive.Nexa's upgraded version will include a mechanism for mining rewards for positive behavior. Users can earn rewards for their high-quality work, comments, and promotion activities. The rewards will be related to the user's weight and their content's quality.Nexa aims to create a community of like-minded individuals who share a common interest in positive behavior and cryptocurrency. The platform is designed to provide an incentive for users to promote positivity and engage with others in a meaningful way. Join us and be part of the Nexa community today!Our development team is based in Canada and the US, and we are currently seeking seed funding for our $5 million valuation. We are committed to completing our initial version, which is currently in development, and will continue to update our progress here. While Nexa is not an open-source project in its early stages, similar platforms like Steemit exist in our market space.Our current fundraising target is $500,000, and if you invest in us, we promise to work hard and provide token rewards for our backers. However, since we cannot guarantee the future value of our tokens, we urge our investors to learn more about us and be cautious when considering investing in Nexa.If you are interested in learning more about Nexa, please contact us at nexa.land@aol.com for more information.
